Ooc: repost

Straightshot puffs up her quills and circles Saberback defian=
tly.  Threat or no threat she was dead set on finishing what she started.

=
" Aww what's a matter?!  Too chicken ta fight me because I gave ya a bad Ow=
ie!?  Only a chicken would threaten someone else instead of their real oppo=
nent.  Nightlights not your challenger, I AM!  And I challenge you to a one=
 on one, RIGHT HERE AND NOW!"

While fighting the Skarkticons, Straightshot=
s words are heard by Quickstride and Rattrap, who look back in alarm.

" IS=
 SHE OUTA HER MIND!?    PRICKLES! DON'T !  HE'LL SEND YA STRAIGHT TA THE JU=
NKYARD! "

Straightshot keeps her optics on Saberback.  She ignores the cri=
es of warning and wrinkles her snout in combative warning, chattering her t=
eeth in porcupine fashion.  

" C'mon what are ya waiting for!?  Bring it !=
"

Quickstride faces his own issues with the Sharkticons and rears up on hi=
s hind legs, using his hooves to try and ward them off.

" These goons are =
worse than horseflies!  GET OUTA HERE IF YA KNOW THAT'S GOOD FOR YA!  "

Me=
anwhile, Tucson continues to step forth to face Magmatron.  With no fear, j=
ust the courage he was programmed with, he takes a brave step forward.  He =
holds his hand back to Leo and Big Convoy.  It was clear that he wanted to =
fight him on his own, knowing that it was his idea to come this far and he =
alone had to complete the journey.

" Leo, Convoy, help Optimus, I will dea=
l with Magmatron.  I started this journey, now I must complete it.    Very =
well Magmatron you have your battle. "

He takes his Martial Arts stance, a=
nd prepares to go one on one with Magmatron.  And hopefully win back what t=
he Silver Dragon had fought for so many years .
